title: Aleksei Kocharygin
text:
Aleksei Vladimirovich Kocharygin (; born 17 February 1976) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played 3 seasons in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Tyumen">FC Tyumen</a>, <a href="FC%20Shinnik%20Yaroslavl">FC Shinnik Yaroslavl</a> and <a href="FC%20Khimki">FC Khimki</a>.
